article.author: Hurtigruten
article.title: Explore Antarctica with Hurtigruten
article.lead: Isolated, untouched and immersive. Let the elements rule and truly discover the white solitude and fearless wildlife that thrives in Antarctica.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZTopU2ngANo?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>
